casebody.data:
Armentrout et al., Appellees, v. Anthem Casualty Insurance Company, Appellant.

[Cite as Armentrout v. Anthem Cas. Ins. Co. (2001), 92 Ohio St.3d 88.]

*89(No. 01-296 Submitted May 30, 2001 Decided June 20, 2001.) Robert E. Kerper, Jr., for appellees. Lane, Alton & Horst and Todd A Cook, for appellant.

The discretionary appeal is allowed.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Davidson v. Motorists Mut. Ins. Co. (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 262, 744 N.E.2d 713.

Moyer, C.J., F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas and Resnick, JJ., dissent.
